links.title: Jump on the VM in Turbonomic ARM UI

options.content:
The VM is currently $VM_STATE.

Name Environment Type First Seen Date Last Seen Date Guest OS Number of vCPUs Quantity of vMem Connected Networks
${VM} ${VM_ENVIRONMENT} ${VM_FIRST_SEEN} ${VM_LAST_SEEN} ${VM_OS_TYPE} - ${VM_OS_NAME} ${VM_NUM_CPUS} ${VM_MEMORY_CURGBCAPACITY} GB ${VM_CONNECTED_NETWORKS}

targets.rawSql:
select e.name from "scope" s
join entity e on s.scoped_oid = e.oid
where s.seed_oid = $VM_OID
and s.scoped_type = 'GROUP'
and s.finish >= $__timeTo()
order by e.name

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  "type" as metric,
  utilization as value
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  (type = 'VCPU' or type = 'VMEM') AND
  entity_oid = $VM_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  utilization as value,
  "type" as metric
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  (type IN ('CPU_READY','Q1_VCPU','Q2_VCPU','Q4_VCPU','Q8_VCPU','Q16_VCPU','Q32_VCPU','Q64_VCPU')) AND
  entity_oid = $VM_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  consumed as value,
  "type" as metric
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  (type IN ('SWAPPING','BALLOONING')) AND
  entity_oid = $VM_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  consumed
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  type = 'STORAGE_LATENCY' AND
  entity_oid = $VM_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  consumed
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  type = 'STORAGE_ACCESS' AND
  entity_oid = $VM_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  consumed
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  type = 'IO_THROUGHPUT' AND
  entity_oid = $VM_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  consumed
FROM metric
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  type = 'NET_THROUGHPUT' AND
  entity_oid = $VM_OID
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "time",
  count(type) as value,
  CONCAT(category,' - ',type) as metric
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  target_entity_id = $VM_OID
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  (category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE' OR category = 'PREVENTION') AND
  target_entity_id = $VM_OID
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  (category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT') AND
  target_entity_id = $VM_OID
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  (category = 'COMPLIANCE') AND
  target_entity_id = $VM_OID
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  (category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE' OR category = 'PREVENTION') AND
  target_entity_id = $VM_OID
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT' AND
  target_entity_id = $VM_OID
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  recommendation_time AS "Time",
  description AS "Description"
FROM pending_action
WHERE
  category = 'COMPLIANCE' AND
  target_entity_id = $VM_OID
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT
  description AS "Description",
  acceptance_time AS "Acceptance Time",
  recommendation_time as "Recommendation Time",
  final_state as "Final State",
  "type" as "Type",
  category as "Category",
  savings as "Savings"
FROM completed_action
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("acceptance_time") AND
  target_entity_id = $VM_OID
ORDER BY acceptance_time DESC

select
  m."time" as "time",
  m.utilization as value,
  CONCAT(m."type",' - ',e.name) as metric
from "scope" s
join metric m on m.entity_oid = s.scoped_oid
join entity e on m.entity_oid = e."oid" 
where
$__timeFilter(m."time")
and s.seed_oid = $VM_OID
and m."type" IN ('CPU', 'MEM')
and s.scoped_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
and m."time" >= s."start" and m."time" <= s.finish
order by m."time", metric

select
  m."time" as "time",
  m.utilization as value,
  CONCAT(m."type",' - ',e.name) as metric
from "scope" s
join metric m on m.entity_oid = s.scoped_oid
join entity e on m.entity_oid = e."oid" 
where
$__timeFilter(m."time")
and s.seed_oid = $VM_OID
and m."type" IN ('Q1_VCPU','Q2_VCPU','Q4_VCPU','Q8_VCPU','Q16_VCPU','Q32_VCPU','Q64_VCPU')
and s.scoped_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
and m."time" >= s."start" and m."time" <= s.finish
order by m."time", metric

list.definition: select name from entity where type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' order by 1
list.name: VM
list.query: select name from entity where type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' order by 1

list.definition: select oid from entity where name = '$VM' and type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' order by last_seen DESC limit 1
list.name: VM_OID
list.query: select oid from entity where name = '$VM' and type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' order by last_seen DESC limit 1

list.definition:
SELECT
CASE environment
WHEN 'ON_PREM' THEN 'On-Premise'
WHEN 'CLOUD' Then 'Cloud'
END
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID
list.name: VM_ENVIRONMENT
list.query:
SELECT
CASE environment
WHEN 'ON_PREM' THEN 'On-Premise'
WHEN 'CLOUD' Then 'Cloud'
END
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID

list.definition:
SELECT
attrs->>'guest_os_type'
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID
list.name: VM_OS_TYPE
list.query:
SELECT
attrs->>'guest_os_type'
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID

list.definition:
SELECT
attrs->>'guest_os_name'
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID
list.name: VM_OS_NAME
list.query:
SELECT
attrs->>'guest_os_name'
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID

list.definition:
SELECT
attrs->>'num_cpus'
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID
list.name: VM_NUM_CPUS
list.query:
SELECT
attrs->>'num_cpus'
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID

list.definition:
select round(capacity/1024/1024) from metric
where entity_oid = $VM_OID
and type = 'VMEM'
ORDER by time DESC limit 1
list.name: VM_MEMORY_CURGBCAPACITY
list.query:
select round(capacity/1024/1024) from metric
where entity_oid = $VM_OID
and type = 'VMEM'
ORDER by time DESC limit 1

list.definition:
SELECT
jsonb_array_elements_text(attrs->'connected_networks') as "Connected Networks"
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID
list.name: VM_CONNECTED_NETWORKS
list.query:
SELECT
jsonb_array_elements_text(attrs->'connected_networks') as "Connected Networks"
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID

list.definition:
SELECT
first_seen
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID
list.name: VM_FIRST_SEEN
list.query:
SELECT
first_seen
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID

list.definition:
SELECT
last_seen
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID
list.name: VM_LAST_SEEN
list.query:
SELECT
last_seen
FROM entity
WHERE oid = $VM_OID

list.definition:
SELECT
CASE WHEN int_value::entity_state = 'POWERED_ON' THEN 'Powered On' 
ELSE 'Powered Off'
END
FROM historical_entity_attrs
WHERE entity_oid = $VM_OID
AND type = 'ENTITY_STATE'
ORDER by time DESC limit 1
list.name: VM_STATE
list.query:
SELECT
CASE WHEN int_value::entity_state = 'POWERED_ON' THEN 'Powered On' 
ELSE 'Powered Off'
END
FROM historical_entity_attrs
WHERE entity_oid = $VM_OID
AND type = 'ENTITY_STATE'
ORDER by time DESC limit 1
